purpose: Facilitate the creation of integrations with various platforms by reverse engineering their internal APIs.
principle: Utilizes reverse engineering techniques to understand and interact with undocumented APIs, enabling integration without official support.
reusability: Designed to be adaptable for various platforms by leveraging reverse engineering, supports plugin-like architecture for custom integrations.
limitations: May face legal and ethical challenges due to reverse engineering, limited by the complexity and variability of undocumented APIs.
name: Integuru
description: The first AI agent that builds permissionless integrations through reverse engineering platforms' internal APIs.
highlight: Builds permissionless integrations through reverse engineering of platforms' internal APIs.
